title: Mayura Kantabharanam: Diamond & Emerald Peacock Necklace Set
materials: Cultured Pearls. Features Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting luster.
features: A breathtaking statement piece featuring an intricately designed peacock motif. Fine diamond-encrusted filigree work with a central emerald accent. The peacock's plumage is adorned with graduated emeralds, cascading down. The necklace is further enhanced with delicate pearl drops, adding a touch of classic elegance. The adjustable gold chain ensures a comfortable fit.
occasions: Perfect for a grand South Indian wedding (Muhurtham)
or other significant life events. Also suitable for high-end galas and special occasions where you want to make a lasting impression.
description: This Mayura Kantabharanam is a masterpiece of craftsmanship, blending traditional design with contemporary elegance. The peacock, a symbol of beauty and prosperity, makes this piece particularly auspicious for bridal wear. The high-quality diamonds and emeralds ensure lasting brilliance and value. Handcrafted in Hyderabad, known for its exquisite jewelry traditions.
